title: Rotational KE - most total KE of 3 disks

content.question: Three identical uniform disks, <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>, <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>, and <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math>, can each slide along a horizontal surface with negligible friction. Disk <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> is rotating with angular speed <math alttext="omega sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> while its center of mass remains in place. Disk <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> is moving with speed <math alttext="v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math> without rotating. Disk <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math> is rotating with the same angular speed <math alttext="omega sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> as Disk <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> while its center of mass is moving with the same speed <math alttext="v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math> as Disk <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math>. Which disk has the greatest total kinetic energy?

choices.label: Disk <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> has the most total kinetic energy.
Disk <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> has the most total kinetic energy.
Disk <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math> has the most total kinetic energy.

It cannot be determined which disk has the most total kinetic energy without more information on <math alttext="omega sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>, <math alttext="v sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>, and the radius of the disks.

content.answer: Disk <math alttext="C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>C</mtext></math> has the most total kinetic energy.
